H0.text: Who created the ‘A’ Line in 1955. Balenciaga

H1.text: Who created the ‘A’ Line in 1955. Hubert de Givenchy

H2.text: Who created the ‘A’ Line in 1955. Pierre Balmain

H3.text: Who created the ‘A’ Line in 1955. Dior Monsieur

A4.text: The term was first used by the French couture designer Christian Dior as the label for his collection of spring 1955.
